tests.name: png_extractGIF - GIF extracted with correct file size (waf)
tests.run: ./test -w NoTests 'png_extractGIF - GIF extracted with correct file size (waf)'

tests.name: png_extractGIF - GIF extracted successfully and content correct (natalia)
tests.run: ./test -w NoTests 'png_extractGIF - GIF extracted successfully and content correct (natalia)'

tests.name: png_extractGIF - Fails with error code on a PNG without a uiuc chunk
tests.run: ./test -w NoTests 'png_extractGIF - Fails with error code on a PNG without a uiuc chunk'

tests.name: png_hideGIF - Hidden PNG chunk layout is correct
tests.run: ./test -w NoTests 'png_hideGIF - Hidden PNG chunk layout is correct'

tests.name: png_hideGIF - Round trip with png_extractGIF returns original GIF
tests.run: ./test -w NoTests 'png_hideGIF - Round trip with png_extractGIF returns original GIF'

tests.name: `PNG_open` fails on an invalid filename
tests.run: ./test -w NoTests '`PNG_open` fails on an invalid filename'

tests.name: `PNG_open` validates a valid PNG signature
tests.run: ./test -w NoTests '`PNG_open` validates a valid PNG signature'

tests.name: `PNG_open` fails a non-PNG signature file
tests.run: ./test -w NoTests '`PNG_open` fails a non-PNG signature file'

tests.name: `PNG_read` returns PNG file chunks correctly
tests.run: ./test -w NoTests '`PNG_read` returns PNG file chunks correctly'

tests.name: `PNG_read` returns the correct return values
tests.run: ./test -w NoTests '`PNG_read` returns the correct return values'

tests.name: `PNG_open` writes a correct PNG header
tests.run: ./test -w NoTests '`PNG_open` writes a correct PNG header'

tests.name: `PNG_write` writes a PNG chunk and CRC
tests.run: ./test -w NoTests '`PNG_write` writes a PNG chunk and CRC'

tests.name: `PNG_write` writes a PNG chunk with correct endianness
tests.run: ./test -w NoTests '`PNG_write` writes a PNG chunk with correct endianness'
